abstract: Report by Joseph S Bermudez Jr, arms expert with research group 38north, suggests that North Korea is working to develop ability to launch missiles from submarines; says satellite images show North Korean submarine with possible launching tubes.
lead_paragraph: A research group that focuses on North Korea said satellite imagery showed what appeared to be launching tubes on a North Korean submarine.
snippet: A research group that focuses on North Korea said satellite imagery showed what appeared to be launching tubes on a North Korean submarine.

headline.main: North Korea Seems to Be Closer to Missile-Launching Submarine
headline.print_headline: North Korea Seems to Be Closer to Missile-Launching Submarine
